page.title: 03THE TRIP TO LEFFMANS FACTORY
page.content:
The first Leffmans factory was founded 50 years ago.The factory that we went to in Whiddon Valley was founded in 1981.They make underwear.They pack 100 boxes a day.The manager's name is Mr. Stone,he has been there for 2 months. Work starts at 8:15am and ends at 4:50pm with \ an hour for lunch.They mostly use cotton and nylon.They supply Marks and Spencers,Debenhams, Dorothy Perkins and Gossards.In the factory they have 160 to 180 machines. They employ 125 people.Only 5 are men.They all have 30 days holiday a year.In the factory it was very noisy,and the machines were very dusty.The canteen was good and overall the factory was clean.
By Jason Pincombe & Steven Cosgrove.
